item.title: GGVG01 - Fran Bow
item.description: While I’m a free software enthusiast, I love videogames as an art form (even if playing them involves messing with ugly DRM). That’s why I’ve decided I will start talking (spoiler-free) about my favorite ones in my new series: the Geminaut’s Guide to Video Games! Context Fran Bow was developed by Killmonday Games, a Swedish indie studio composed of Natalia and Isak Martinsson. This game was suggested to me by my ex-girlfriend.
